content: We do look at risk adjusted returns in our markets over a minimum of a five year period, and understand are there better places to put that capital, whether it's in other markets, whether it's in other types of assets like we have done over the last two years or whether it's to repurchase our stock, which is trading at a 50% discount due to the leverage level that company, but a 25% to 30% discount in actual private market value compared to how that's valued on an unlevered basis, with a company.
